name: Musical Tabletop Coding Framework
tagline: A rapid development framework to create musical tabletop PD apps.
body:
Musical Tabletop Coding Framework is a rapid development framework to create musical tabletop PD apps.

## MTCF in action!
http://vimeo.com/groups/main/videos/45706644

## Usage
1. Execute the program
2. Open main.pd with [PureData](http://puredata.info)
3. Hack!

## Compiling
You will need:
* [openFrameworks](http://www.openframeworks.cc)
* [ofxTableGestures addon](http://github.com/chaosct/ofxTableGestures)
Compile it as any other openframeworks app.

## Authors
* Carles F. Juli√† @chaosct
* Daniel Gallardo @bestsheep1

This project is released under the MIT license.
